        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1933</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Take a break or 20 questions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nehmen Sie einen Bruch oder 20 Fragen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Prenez une rupture ou 20 questions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Faça exame de uma ruptura ou de 20 perguntas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Prenda una rottura o 20 domande</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πάρτε σπάσιμο ή 20 ερωτήσεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tome una rotura o 20 preguntas</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a fun online internet activity where the student plays 20 questions against the computer</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">games</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">questions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">words</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist ein Internet-Online-Dienst des Spaßes,
in dem der Kursteilnehmer 20 Fragen gegen den Computer spielt</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est une activité en ligne d'Internet 
d'amusement où l'étudiant joue 20 questions contre l'ordinateur</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma atividade em linha do Internet do 
divertimento onde o estudante jogue 20 perguntas de encontro ao 
computador</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un'attività in linea del Internet di 
divertimento dove l'allievo gioca 20 domande contro il calcolatore</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι μια σε απευθείας σύνδεση δραστηριότητα 
Διαδικτύου διασκέδασης όπου ο σπουδαστής παίζει 20 ερωτήσεις 
ενάντια στον υπολογιστή</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es una actividad en línea del Internet de la
diversión donde el estudiante juega 20 preguntas contra el ordenador</string>
          </description>
